ygData.subject: Re: Archmage Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Increased reduction in agro radius.  My guess.  If w/o lute agro radius is decreased by say 35%, then with lute it is decreased by say 45%?  But if the base
ygData.messageBody:
Increased reduction in agro radius. My guess. If w/o lute agro radius is
decreased by say 35%, then with lute it is decreased by say 45%? But if the
base radius are so huge to begin with, perhaps you will never see a benefit
(depends on the situation/mob/dungeon). Time to lament some GIBS? <eg>

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Stephen E. McCloskey <s.mccloskey@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 9:45 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Archmage Answers


> From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>
>
> Q: Are there enhanced effects for these songs when the proper instrument
is
> equipped? In the case of Aquatic Ayre, is the enhancement range increased?
> For Sirens and Pixie Strike, does it increased duration, chance of
success,
> or both?
>
> A: Instruments only effect the primary effects of the song (healing, buff,
> attack speed, etc.) - not the range/duration/chance of success, etc.

> (For Lamanent Song)
> What bonus do we get
> when using a lute/mandolin?
